title: The Cave community
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explains why the relatively unchanging environment of caves provides biologists with important data. Shows the evolutionary and adaptive modifications of cave dwelling bats, fish, insects and salamanders.
